front.title: Using Operator-defined TLVs for Agile Service Deployment

abstract.t: This document proposes a TLV within the body of the OSPF Router Information (RI) Opaque LSA, called Operator-defined Sub-TLV Container TLV. Here the term OSPF means both OSPFv2 and OSPFv3.This attribute is meant to accommodate policy-based and deployment- specific use cases.
